metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7524 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Dovecot before 2.2.36.3 and 2.3.x before 2.3.5.1, a local attacker cancause a buffer overflow in the indexer-worker process, which can be used toelevate to root. This occurs because of missing checks in the fts andpop3-uidl components.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7524` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dovecot package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10').
